name: APOD to Desktop
short_description:
This application sets the Astronomy Picture of the Day (http://apod.nasa.gov/apod/astropix.html) as your Desktop Wallpaper each day at user logon, presenting a new image of the universe on your desktop each day.

Current Version: 1.0 (Last Updated 2014 April 5)

(( Requires Microsoft .NET 4.5 Framework available here: http://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=30653 ))

------------------------------------

Version 1.0 Notes:

** The application must be run once to create a newly scheduled task to update the desktop wallpaper.

** The Settings Checkbox labeled "Automatically check for newer versions of APOD to Desktop" and the "About" Menu Strip button are currently nonfunctional.
summary: Automatically set the APOD as your desktop wallpaper daily.
